short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens a random blurred image in new tab, which can be viewed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blur New Tab opens a new tab with blurry view. Instantly open a captivating world of blurred images in a new tab. Each click on new tab button unveils a unique, abstract snapshot, offering a refreshing and thought-provoking visual journey.
